Package game.runes

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.runes.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
The RuneManager class is responsible for managing the number of runes that the player possesses. It provides methods for adding and subtracting runes from the player's wallet, as well as getting the current number of runes the player has. Created by:
